Newsletters.description: Read the newsletters to get information about recent events concerning the series/the author. The newsletters also have little shorts involving the characters written for fun.

Toranoko! Keepers.description: Toranoko! Keepers is a side story of the main Toranoko! series. The novel is an anthology consisting of six stories. Each story follows a different adult in the lives of Taiga and Ryūji's daughters: Taiga's parents, Yasuko, Ami and, Ryūji and Taiga themselves. All of them take place before the events of the main series.

Volume 1.description: The first volume of 'Toranoko!' and the first entry of Haruko's storyline. The Takasu sisters are entering their second year at Ohashi High School. Haruko arrives with the goal of getting her sisters' grades up. But after her English teacher decides to assign a pair project, she is forced to cross paths with a, irate, sleep-deprived loner named Sagawa Kaito, her randomly-assigned partner.
